class.name: VisualShaderNodeScreenUVToSDF
class.brief_description: A function to convert screen UV to an SDF (signed-distance field), to be used within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Translates to [code]screen_uv_to_sdf(uv)[/code] in the shader language. If the UV port isn't connected, [code]SCREEN_UV[/code] is used instead.
